edu.ucla.sspace.dependency

Interface DependencyPathWeight

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlatPathWeight, LengthPathWeight, RelationPathWeight, RelationSumPathWeight

    public interface DependencyPathWeight
    An interface for weighting, or scoring, dependency paths. Implementations are suggested to be thread-safe and stateless .
    Author:
    Keith Stevens

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double scorePath(DependencyPath path)
      Returns the score of the provided DependencyPath.

    • Method Detail

      • scorePath

        double scorePath(DependencyPath path)
        Returns the score of the provided DependencyPath. The score may be a function of the length of the path, arbitrary, e.g., 1 for all paths, or may be a function of the relations and terms in the path.
        Parameters:
        path - A list of the term,relation links in the DependencyPath being scored
        Returns:
        The score of the dependecy path
